name: Would You Rather!?
description:
Not your everyday "Would You Rather game".


Push the limits of you and your friends with this spin on the classic Would you Rather game!

The game is very easy to play, you are given two options and you simply just pick the choice of which you would rather do! Keep playing to earn points which you could use at the shop to get a variety of in game rewards!

Play when you're out with friends or parties and get to REALLY know who you've been hanging out with!

Don't forget to rate and comment with any feedback or suggestions!
